itemInfo.itemDesc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Rough Translucent Crystals found near Goblin Cave.

item.name: Rough Translucent Crystal
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing. Rough Translucent Crystal requires a certain level of skill to collect.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Gathered near the Goblin Cave.

item.name: Agerian Helmet
item.desc: Specially made armor for elite members of militia\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect

item.name: Ash Tree Float
item.desc: A float made of ash wood. Good for catching big fishes.\n\nCan be enhanced with Blackstone (Weapon).

item.name: Ultimate Agerian Shoes
item.desc: Agerian Shoes with maximum potential\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect\n- Restore Max Durability : Every Agerian Shoes
